com.clarionmedia.infinitum.di

Class DexMakerProxy

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.clarionmedia.infinitum.di.AbstractProxy
      • com.clarionmedia.infinitum.di.DexMakerProxy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.reflect.InvocationHandler
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AdvisedDexMakerProxy, LazyLoadDexMakerProxy, SessionProxy

    public abstract class DexMakerProxy
extends AbstractProxy

    Abstract implementation of AbstractProxy that relies on DexMaker in order to proxy non-final classes in addition to interfaces.

    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0 07/14/12
    Author:
    Tyler Treat
    See Also:
    AdvisedDexMakerProxy, LazyLoadDexMakerProxy
